General.Name: Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development Co Ltd
General.Description: Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd engages in the real estate development activities in China. It is involved in building construction activities; undertakes greenery garden works; and provision of urban management services. Beijing Dalong Weiye Real Estate Development Co.,Ltd was founded in 1998 and is based in Beijing, China.
General.Address: No. 2 A, Fuqian East Street, Beijing, China, 101300
